snippet: Serena Williams rolled her ankle at the Australian Open on Tuesday early in her first match with Edina Gallovits-Hall of Romania. After a medical timeout to apply tape, Williams strode back on to the court and breezed to a 6-0, 6-0 victory in 54...
abstract: Serena Williams rolled her ankle at the Australian Open on Tuesday early in her first match with Edina Gallovits-Hall of Romania. After a medical timeout to apply tape, Williams strode back on to the court and breezed to a 6-0, 6-0 victory in 54 minutes.

headline.main: Williams Twists Ankle but Breezes to Win
